data.title: Je9 William Jennings
data.meta_description: Virginia families, writers of history, history makers
data.text:
Je11. possible father was Sir John Jenyns of Churchill b about 1590 d 1642and Alice Spencer of Offley who had 23 children of whom 21 unnamed in the Visitations. If so John Jennings Je10 was also the uncle of the Sarah Jennings who married John Churchill, 1st Duke of Marlborough.

However, the author does have a DNA match with a descendant of John Jennens b 8 Aug 1579 Warwickshire d there 25 Feb 1653 m Joyce Weeman. Je12 Ralph Jenyns of Islington and Churchill (d 1572)

m1 Anne Brouncker (dau of Sir William Brouncker)

m Margaret Jennings Payne b 1635/40 d 15 Feb 1684 dau of John Payne b about 1615 in Yorkshire bapt 3 Nov 1616 Frittenden, Kent d 1690 Rappahanock/?Richmond Va and Margaret ?Robinson, who later married Christopher Edrington. ysearch.org/WAHAH shows parents of John Payne as Moses Payne b 23 Apr 1581 in Kent Engl. d 12 Apr 1643 in Braintree, Norfolk Ma. and Elizabeth Sheafe b 26 Oct 1589 in Cranbrook Kent, Engl. d 11 Oct 1632 in Kent Engl.
